text:
─And besides, instead of just doing
matching poses with Hana and the fans,

I think poses that you create together
might make the fans even happier.

Poses like creating a heart with one hand each
and then putting them together.

Wow, yeah──!
...I'll take that suggestion, okay?

Haha...!
I'm glad I could be of help.

...So, six more to go──!
Can I still rely on the Producer's help?

S-Six more...!
I'll do my best to think of them! Um──
